en: The cause of this illness is stress.
zh: 这病是压力大造成的。

en: I want to mop the floor.
zh: 我想拖地。

en: I lost one of my shoes.
zh: 我丢了一只鞋。

en: I can't find one of my shoes.
zh: 我有一只鞋找不着了。

en: When was the last time I used my brain? I don't even remember.
zh: 我上回动脑子是什么时候？我都不记得了。

en: Look, will-o'-the-wisps!
zh: 看，是鬼火！

en: Please tell me what to do next.
zh: 请告诉我接下来该怎么做。

en: My elbow hurts whenever I do this.
zh: 我只要一做这个动作，手肘就疼。

en: You hurt my wife, and I'll kill you.
zh: 你敢动我老婆，我就杀了你。

en: Does your foot still hurt?
zh: 你的脚还疼吗？

en: My teeth hurt when I drink something cold.
zh: 我一喝凉的牙就疼。

en: If we aren't careful, someone will get hurt.
zh: 如果我们不小心，会有人受伤的。

en: If we aren't careful, someone's going to get hurt.
zh: 如果我们不留神，肯定会有人受伤。

en: Do your feet still hurt?
zh: 你的脚还疼吗？

en: We feel the same.
zh: 我们有同感。

en: I don't know if I'll be able to help you.
zh: 我不知道能不能帮上你。

en: I live very near here.
zh: 我就住在附近。

en: Tom is a stingy guy.
zh: 汤姆这人挺抠的。

en: We eat bread every day.
zh: 我们每天都吃面包。

en: Tom doesn't realize that Mary lied.
zh: 汤姆没意识到玛丽撒了谎。

en: How long will it take to get to the stadium?
zh: 去体育场要多长时间？

en: Housework is also an important job.
zh: 家务活也是一项重要的工作。

en: I told her that wasn't a problem.
zh: 我跟她说那不是问题。

en: Tom likes to spend time outdoors.
zh: 汤姆喜欢待在户外。

en: You're about as stubborn as Tom is.
zh: 你跟汤姆一样固执。

en: Thanks for helping me write my resume.
zh: 谢谢你帮我写简历。

en: I caught a very big fish today.
zh: 我今天钓到了一条大鱼。

en: I don't want to buy anything that I don't need.
zh: 我不想买不需要的东西。

en: I don't want to buy anything I don't need.
zh: 我不想买我不需要的东西。

en: Please be a little more patient. Hopefully, we'll have a solution soon.
zh: 请再耐心一点，希望我们很快就有解决办法。

en: I'm rarely late.
zh: 我很少迟到。

en: Please give me your real name.
zh: 请告诉我你的真实姓名。

en: These colors don't go together well.
zh: 这几种颜色不怎么搭。

en: This new design is much better than the old one.
zh: 这个新设计比旧的好多了。

en: The big problem is not that I'm fat now, but that I'm doing everything with the same rhythm, basically with the same speed as when I was 30 kilos lighter. And it puts a lot of stress on my body.
zh: 最大的问题不是我现在胖了，而是我现在的节奏，基本上还是按照以前瘦三十公斤时的速度来。这让我的身体负担很重。

en: Tom is careless and often makes mistakes.
zh: 汤姆很粗心，经常出错。

en: I'd like to become a famous footballer.
zh: 我想成为一名著名的足球运动员。

en: I'd like to be a famous footballer.
zh: 我想当个出名的足球运动员。

en: Do you always wear a tie at work?
zh: 你上班都要系领带吗？

en: If it rains, we'll go to the cinema.
zh: 如果下雨，我们就去电影院。

en: Tom liked football.
zh: 汤姆以前挺喜欢足球的。

en: I'm sorry about what I said. I was out of order.
zh: 对不起，我刚才说的话过分了，是我失礼了。

en: What's your favourite music?
zh: 你最喜欢什么样的音乐？

en: If you pay me, I'l do it.
zh: 你付我钱，我就干。

en: I might have to go to Australia.
zh: 我可能得去一趟澳大利亚。

en: How is your project progressing?
zh: 你的项目进展得怎么样了？

en: Peel the apples and slice them in half, cutting out the core.
zh: 把苹果皮削了，切成两半，然后把核挖掉。

en: The package had a sticker on it that said "Handle with care".
zh: 包裹上贴着个标签，写着“小心轻放”。

en: All you need to do is to write your name and address here.
zh: 你只需要在这里写上你的名字和地址。

en: Tom may cry.
zh: 汤姆可能会哭。

en: Mary took her phone out of her handbag.
zh: 玛丽从手提包里拿出了手机。

en: If there's anything I can do for you, tell me.
zh: 有什么我能帮上忙的，尽管跟我说。

en: If there's anything I can do for you, let me know.
zh: 有什么我能帮上忙的，告诉我一声。

en: Don't fall asleep. If you fall asleep, you'll die.
zh: 别睡着。你要是睡着了，就会没命的。

en: Don't go to sleep. If you do, you'll die.
zh: 别睡觉。你要是睡了，就会死的。

en: Name three types of bread.
zh: 说出三种面包的名字。

en: There's a stain on your T-shirt.
zh: 你T恤上有个污渍。

en: I listen to the radio every day.
zh: 我每天都听收音机。

en: I'm Canadian, but I live in Australia.
zh: 我是加拿大人，但我住在澳大利亚。

en: Why is it so dark?
zh: 怎么这么黑？

en: I can't find my key, but it has to be somewhere around here.
zh: 我找不到钥匙了，但肯定就在这附近。

en: Will you be drinking tea or coffee?
zh: 你喝茶还是咖啡？

en: I'm doing this for our kids' future.
zh: 我这样做是为了孩子们的未来。

en: It hurts, doesn't it?
zh: 挺疼的吧？

en: Are you coming this weekend?
zh: 你这周末来吗？

en: That's a famous tune.
zh: 那是一首很有名的曲子。

en: That's a famous song.
zh: 那是一首很有名的歌。

en: That's a well-known piece of music.
zh: 那是一段很有名的音乐。

en: I wonder how many they need.
zh: 我在想他们需要多少个。

en: I hope it keeps raining.
zh: 我希望雨一直下。

en: My watch stopped, so I didn't know what time it was.
zh: 我的表停了，所以我不知道几点了。

en: Keep the windows closed.
zh: 把窗户关好。

en: How long will be you be staying in Australia?
zh: 你要在澳大利亚待多久？

en: Please sing with me.
zh: 请跟我一起唱。

en: I'm going to go lock the door.
zh: 我去锁个门。

en: The door closed with a clank.
zh: 门“哐当”一声关上了。

en: The door closed with a clunk.
zh: 门“咣当”一声关上了。

en: Is it OK to eat moldy bread?
zh: 发霉的面包还能吃吗？

en: "What should I do with this moldy bread?" "If it's moldy, throw it in the trash."
zh: “这发霉的面包怎么处理？”“要是发霉了就扔进垃圾桶吧。”

en: I don't want to talk about that anymore.
zh: 我不想再谈那件事了。

en: That's a bread knife. To cut cheese, this knife is better.
zh: 那是把切面包的刀。切奶酪的话，这把刀更好用。

en: We had a lovely time.
zh: 我们玩得很开心。

en: We have a thirty-minute lunch break.
zh: 我们有三十分钟的午休时间。

en: I'll email you.
zh: 我会给你发邮件的。

en: I'll send you an email.
zh: 我会给你发封邮件。

en: I'll mail you the books.
zh: 我会把那些书寄给你。

en: I'll mail you the book.
zh: 我会把那本书寄给你。

en: I want to see the sixth Harry Potter film.
zh: 我想看哈利·波特第六部电影。

en: "Are you Russian?" "No, I'm Slovakian."
zh: “你是俄罗斯人吗？”“不，我是斯洛伐克人。”

en: There's a lot, but it's still not enough.
zh: 虽然有很多，但还是不够。

en: It's a lot, but it's not enough.
zh: 挺多的，但不够。

en: It's a lot, but it's still not enough.
zh: 挺多的，但还是不够。

en: I'll call you after dinner.
zh: 我晚饭后给你打电话。

en: I'll call you after I've finished eating dinner.
zh: 我等吃完晚饭后再给你打电话。

en: Tom smoothly opened the door.
zh: 汤姆很顺畅地打开了门。

en: I spread cheese on the bread.
zh: 我在面包上涂了奶酪。

en: When I became aware of my surroundings, I was living with my father and grandmother.
zh: 在我开始记事的时候，我正和父亲还有奶奶住在一起。

en: I don't know anything about my mother. Before I was old enough to remember, she left our home.
zh: 我对我母亲一无所知。在我还没记事的时候，她就离开家了。

en: No way! That's definitely a lie！
zh: 不可能！那绝对是谎话！

en: I hear there are a lot of foxes around here, but I seldom see any.
zh: 听说这附近狐狸挺多的，但我很少见到。

en: I hear there are many foxes in this area, but I rarely see any.
zh: 听说这一带有很多狐狸，但我很少能碰到。

en: I thought that Tom was living here.
zh: 我还以为汤姆住这儿呢。

en: Could I please have a subway map?
zh: 能给我一张地铁线路图吗？

en: I'd like a subway map, please.
zh: 请给我一张地铁图。

en: "I'm leaving." "Have a good day."
zh: “我走啦。”“好，祝你今天过得愉快。”

en: My friends are waiting in front of the library.
zh: 我朋友们在图书馆门口等着呢。

en: This car gets bad gas mileage.
zh: 这车挺费油的。

en: Today, I just want to stay home and do nothing.
zh: 今天我只想待在家里，什么都不想干。

en: Today, I just want to stay home and relax.
zh: 今天我只想待在家里好好放松一下。

en: At school, students learn the three R's.
zh: 在学校，学生们学习读、写、算。

en: I want to go to the pool.
zh: 我想去游泳馆。

en: This is a song that's popular right now.
zh: 这是现在挺火的一首歌。

en: My dentist recommend that I chew sugarless gum.
zh: 牙医建议我嚼无糖口香糖。

en: My dentist recommended that I chew sugar-free gum.
zh: 牙医建议我嚼不含糖的口香糖。

en: I was laughed at at school today.
zh: 我今天在学校被嘲笑了。

en: Oh, no! We're running out of petrol.
zh: 糟糕，车快没油了。

en: Don't eat my potato chips.
zh: 别吃我的薯片。

en: Find the solution to the following equation.
zh: 解一下这个方程。

en: I've got to get the 8.15 train to Paris.
zh: 我得去赶八点一刻去巴黎的那班火车。

en: I need to catch the 8.15 train to Paris.
zh: 我得赶上八点十五那趟去巴黎的火车。

en: My glasses are dirty.
zh: 我的眼镜脏了。
